about_the_game:
◆Story
The player wakes up in a mysterious dungeon. A maze of unknown dungeons spreads out in front of you. Suddenly, a voice can be heard, calling itself the "Administrator" and making an announcement to the players. "This is a world where you can become a bikini hunter and fight against the bikini army. There are six gatekeepers in this dungeon. By defeating all gatekeepers, you can learn the truth about this world."

The player is confused, but becomes a bikini hunter and takes on a battle with an armed bikini army.


◆Experience
- Each of the 6 gatekeepers is armed with a different weapon. Defeating the Gatekeeper will unlock a weapon and allow the player to use it.

- Defeating the Bikini Army will drop currency called packets. You can use it to enhance your weapons or yourself. Find your favorite fighting style and strengthen the weapons that suit you!

・You can enjoy a variety of battles by using shooting, fighting, guarding, and invincibility techniques depending on the situation. The bikini army is a formidable enemy, but you can retry as many times as you like without stress.

content_descriptors.notes: A large number of bikini-clad beauties will appear.

There are six gatekeepers in this dungeon. By defeating all gatekeepers, you can learn the truth about this world."

The player is confused, but becomes a bikini hunter and takes on a battle with an armed bikini army.


◆Experience
- Each of the 6 gatekeepers is armed with a different weapon. Defeating the Gatekeeper will unlock a weapon and allow the player to use it.

- Defeating the Bikini Army will drop currency called packets. You can use it to enhance your weapons or yourself. Find your favorite fighting style and strengthen the weapons that suit you!

・You can enjoy a variety of battles by using shooting, fighting, guarding, and invincibility techniques depending on the situation. The bikini army is a formidable enemy, but you can retry as many times as you like without stress.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a 3D action game where you become a bikini hunter and fight against the bikini army. ・Use shooting, fighting, guarding, and invincibility techniques depending on the situation You can enjoy a variety of battles.
